document_data.mainbody:
end-nets was a warrior of the Ice Hunters tribe that made their home on Oyaviggaton during the late 15 century DR.
He was a rather untrusting individual that held a distinct distaste for the monstrous creatures that laired within his tribes icy island-home. He detested the kobolds that laired within the isles cave network, loathed its community of revolting ice toads, and became completely frightened by its ravenous ice troll denizens.
Sometime during or before the 1480s DR, Mend-nets became infected with some sort of disease. He was segregated from the rest of his tribes in the monster-filled caves that wound throughout Oyaviggaton,
